thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: DANIEL S PROPP
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by DANIEL S PROPP

author: DANIEL S PROPP
title: DANIEL S PROPP
text: I purchased a single used book from Thrift Books. The purchase price was very good and the shipping and handling charges were much less than I had expected. They provide the means to track the shipment. The book arrived in better condition than I had expected. Overall, the experience was much better than expected. I will probably look to Thrift Books first, for my future book purchases.
